blocks.name: getAllPosts
blocks.description: The getAllPosts endpoint allows you to browse all published posts on a particular blog.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: API Access Token.

args.name: blogUrl
args.info: Link of the blog on which we will receive data.

args.name: include
args.info: Include related data.

args.name: limit
args.info: How many posts to retrieve.

args.name: showAllPosts
args.info: Retrieve all posts.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of paginated results to retrieve.

args.name: order
args.info: Choose which field to order by and direction of ordering.

args.name: fields
args.info: Allows you to specify which resource fields to retrieve rather than retrieving the. whole object.

args.name: filter
args.info: Use Ghost Query Language to build complex query.

args.name: resource
args.info: Id or slug changes query to a read request.
